Mukura Victory Sports 1-0 Free State Stars

17:35

Uyu mukino watuma umuntu yibaza byinshi????


Free State Stars yakinnye uyu mukino bisa nâ€™aho ari uburyo bwo kurangiza umuhango. Nta guhangana na guke yigeze igaragaza nkâ€™ikipe ishaka gukomeza mu kindi cyiciro ariko Mukura VS yo yari izi neza icyo usobanuye

17:26

Amashyi menshi kuri Mukura VS


Iyi kipe yashinzwe mu 1963 iri mu zikunzwe kurusha izindi mu Rwanda ariko abakunzi bayo bari bamaze imyaka 26 barira mu myotsi, baruhira abandi, bategereza umunsi izina ryâ€™ikipe yabo rizandikwa mu bitabo byandikwamo abegukanye ibikombe bagaheba kuko baherukaga igikombe mu 1992 ubwo begukana icyâ€™igihugu cyitirirwaga uwari Perezida wâ€™u Rwanda, Habyarimana JuvÃ©nal.

Kuri uyu munsi banditse amateka yo kurenga ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze mu marushanwa Nyafurika.

17:21

Umukino urarangiye, Mukura VS ibonye intsinzi

Mukura VS itsindiye itiike yo kujya mu ijonjora rya kabiri aho izahangana na Al Hilal SC Al Obayed yo muri Sudani nyuma yo gutsinda Free State Stars 1-0 mu mikino yombi

17:18

Rwarutabura yagiye gushyigikira umukeba

Umufana ukomeye wa Rayon Sports,Rwarutabura (uri inyuma muri babiri bahagaze) nawe ari mu Karere ka Huye aho yagiye gufana umukeba ukomeye w'ikipe ye. Aha ni igihugu kiba kirebwa ntabwo biba bikiri ikipe

17:14

86' Olivier Kwizera atabaye izamu rye

Lomami Frank azamukanye umupira yihuta ku ruhande rw'ibumoso aherereza Gael Duhayindavyi wari imbere y'izamu ateye ishoti Olivier Kwizera araryama awukuramo

17:12

84' Umukino ntabwo ukinogeye ijisho kubera ubushake buke bwa Free State Stars

Ikipe yasuye Mukura VS nta shoti na rimwe yateye mu izamu ryayo, nta gusatira ishaka igitego cyo kwishyura, nta mupira Rwabugiri Omar yakuyemo nta bushake bagaragaza mu kibuga. Barahererekanya badashaka gusatira. Abanya-Afurika y'epfo bayiherekeje bemeza ko bafashe uyu mukino nk'imyitozo kuko amarushanwa ya CAF adasanzwe abahira.

17:04

Abafana ba Kiyovu Sports baturutse i Kigali bagiye gutera ingabo mu bitugu Mukura VS

17:00

Olivier Kwizera agiye mu kibuga asimbuye

Mu gice cya kabiri umunyezamu Mbambo Samkalo yagaragaje ibikorwa byo gutinza iminota nyamara batsinzwe. None umutoza we afashe umwanzuro wo kumusimbuza aha umwanya Olivier Kwizera, umunyezamu w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Rwanda Amavubi

16:55

67' Mukura VS isimbuje umukinnyi wa kabiri

Iradukunda Bertrand witwaye neza mu gice cya mbere wasatiraga anyuze ku ruhande rw'ibumoso asimbuwe na Iddy Said Djuma ukomoka mu gihugu cy'u Burundi, wasinyiye Mukura VS mu mpeshyi y'uyu mwaka avuye muri Vital'O FC

16:53

Free State Stars ntabwo igaragaza inyota yo kwishyura

Abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru bari kuri stade Huye batunguwe n'imyitwarire ya Free State Stars. Abakinnyi bayo birakina batuje nta gitutu bagaragaza

16:48

61' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Mukura VS

Ikipe yo mu karere ka Huye yariye amavubi irashaka n'ibindi bitego. Isimbuje Twizerimana Onesme wahushije ibitego byinshi, yinjiza Lomami Frank

16:47

Amwe mu mafoto yaranze igice cya mbere cyihariwe na Mukura VS

16:42

57' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA MUKURA VS

Kuri koruneri nziza itewe na Ciza Hussein Mugabo, umupira urenze ba myugariro bose ba Free State Stars ugera kuri Nshimirimana David afungura amazamu n'umutwe. A

16:40

54' Umukinnyi wa Mukura VS aravunitse ari kwitabwaho

Alexis Nkomezi waje gukina i Huye avuye muri AS Kigali agize ikibazo cy'imvune y'akaboko agwiriye ubwo yarwaniraga umupira wo mu kirere. Ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

16:38

Abakinnyi barindwi ba MVS bari ku ntebe y'abasimbura bagiye kwishyushya

Umutoza Haringingo Franciss ukomoka i Burundi ahagurukije abakinnyi bose bari ku ntebe y'abasimbura barimo Lomami Frank, Ndizeye Innocent na Iddy Said Djuma bashobora kongera imbaraga mu busatirizi

16:32

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Rutahizamu Bhengu Linda atangije umupira ariko bahita bawamburwa n'abakinnyi ba Mukura VS bakomeje gusatira

16:24

Igice cya mbere kirangiye ari ubusa ku busa

16:16

44' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa Free State Stars

Umutoza David Vilakaze akoze impinduka za mbere, kapiteni Leamoha Masehe wavunitse asimbuwe na Hlubi Sibusiso

16:14

42' Olivier Kwizera agiye kwishyushya

Bertrand Iradukunda azamukanye umupira awuhindura awerekeza mu rubuga rw'amahina ashaka Onesme Twizerimana awugeraho ariko agiye gutera mu izamu agongana n'umunyezamu Mbambo. Ubu aryamye hasi bari kumuvura naho Olivier Kwizera atangira kwishyushya ngo nibikomera ajye mu kibuga asimbuye

16:11

39' Umusifuzi yihanangirije abakinnyi ba Free State Stars

Ciza Hussein Mugabo uri kwitwara neza azamukanye umupira awuha Gael Duhayindavyi akorerwa ikosa na Mbuli Tressure umusifuzi aramwihanangiriza amubwira ko niyongera gukora ikosa ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo. Gusa Coup Franc yavuyemo ntacyo ibyaye

16:02

30' Koruneri ya mbere y'umukino

Ubusatirizi bwa MVS buri gukorana imbaraga n'umuvuduko mu guhererekanya. Gael Duhayindavyi bita Maestro azamukanye umupira awucomekera Twizerimana Onesme ariko Mbhele Richard arawumutanga arawurenza. Koruneri ya MVS ntacyo itanze kuko ikuweho neza na ba myugariro ba Free State Stars

15:58

26' Ndayishimiye Christopher ahushije igitego ari imbere y'izamu wenyine

Abakunzi ba Mukura VS ntabwo bumva uburyo batarabona igitego kubera amahirwe abakinnyi bayo bamaze gupfusha ubusa. Rugirayabo Hassan azamukanye umupura ku ruhande rw'iburyo awuhindura imbere y'izamu, Umurundi Ndayishimiye Christopher arawufata asigarana n'umunyezamu wenyine ariko atera hejuru y'izamu

15:55

23' Umutoza wa Mukura VS ntabwo yishimiye ibyemezo by'umusifuzi

Kuko Mukura VS yatangiye isatira Free State Stars imaze gukorera amakosa atatu abakinnyi ba MVS mu minota ine ishize. Umutoza Franciss Haringingo ari kubasabira ikarita y'umuhondo

15:49

AZAM yiseguye ku bakunzi bayo nyuma yo kutabereka uyu mukino

Azam TV yari yakoze ibikenewe kugirango uyu mukino werekwe abanyarwanda 5/5 ariko kubw'impamvu zitunguranye uyu mukino ntabwo uri buze kugaragara kuri AZAM TV.

MUGIRE AMAHORO.@FERWAFA @MukuraVS

— Azam TV Rwanda (@azamtvRw) December 5, 2018


15:43

11' Mukura VS yongeye guhusha igitego cyabazwe

Ciza Hussein Mugabo azamukanye umupira acenga abakinnyi bo hagati babiri ba Free State Stars acomekera umupira mwiza Christopher Ndayishimiye ariko umunyezamu Mbambo Samkelo atabara ikipe ye umupira arawufata

15:41

Mukura niyo isigaye ihagarariye u Rwanda nyuma yo gusezererwa muri CAF kwa APR FC

APR Fc bows out of Total CAF Champions League. https://t.co/4ufBXTf5rL@aprfcofficial3@clubafricain @RwandaMoD @CAF_Online @RwandaMoD #TotalCAFCL#CAAPRFC pic.twitter.com/u3imoBoUhx

— Rwanda FA (@FERWAFA) December 5, 2018


15:39

Imvura nyinshi itunguranye iraguye

Mu gihe ikirere cyari cyiriwe gikeye, mu Mujyi wa Huye haguye imvura nyinshi itunguranye ariko ntabwo bibuza umukino gukomeza

15:37

05' Mukura VS itangiranye umuvuduko wo gushaka igitego

Mukura VS iri imbere y'abafana bayo itangiye isatira ikoresheje abakinnyi batatu. Ciza Hussein Mugabo, Christopher Ndayishimiye na Onesme Twizerimana uhushije igitego cyabazwe asigaranye n'umunyezamu ku mupira mwiza yari acomekewe na Iradukunda Bertrand

15:33

Ikipe ya Free State Stars yaje mu Rwanda izanye abakinnyi bake

Kubera ibibazo by'amikoro n'imvune z'abakinnyi iyi kipe yo muri Afurika y'epfo yazanye abakinnyi 14 gusa kuko ku ntebe y'abasimbura hariho batatu; Olivier Kwizera umunyezamu w'Amavubi, Jappie Mogamad na Hlubi Sibusiso

15:30

Amafoto y'abakinnyi ku mpande zombi ubwo bishyushyaga

15:30

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino ushobora kwandika amateka kuri Mukura VS uratangiye. Utangijwe na rutahizamu Onesme Twizerimana iyi kipe yavanye muri APR FC

15:27

Ku ruhande rwa Free State Stars

Umunyezamu: Mbambo Samkelo

Ba myugariro: Mobbie Nyiko, Mbhele Richard na Keita Bangaly, Mbuly Treasure

Abakina hagati: Masahe Leamoha, Mokhouane Relebogile, na Dramani Sthembiso,

Ba rutahizamu:

Bhengu Linda, Moseamedi Judas na Masina Sibusiso

15:26

Ba myugariro:

15:20

Free State Stars yageze ku kibuga irangajwe imbere na Kwizera Olivier

15:19

Mukura irasabwa gutsinda



Mukura VS irasabwa gutsinda uyu mukino igakomeza mu ijonjora rya kabiri kuko amakipe yombi yari yanganyije 0-0 mu mukino wabereye i Johannesburg muri Afurika y'Epfo mu minsi irindwi (7) ishize. Mukura VS nikomeza izahangana na Al Hilal Obeid yo muri Sudani

15:18

Igicamunsi cyiza kuri mwese

Turi kuri Stade mpuzamahanga ya Huye ahagiye kubera umukino wo kwishyura w'ijonjora ry'ibanze ry'irushanwa rihuza amakipe yatwaye ibikombe by'ibihugu iwayo 'CAF confederation Cup' hagati ya Mukura VS yo mu Rwanda na Free State Stars yo muri Afurika y'Epfo.
